vsParam:
Phew, we killed quite some monsters...
[px], are these enough for your assignment?

Sure, more than enough.
Thank you, guys~

Wow, what's wrong with you, Cresson!?
Don't come here. Your hot blood is suffocating us!

Suffocating... Eh-hem. Here's the thing, [px] is worthy
the name of an alchemist, even [px]'s combat skills are special.

Being able to use various items, including bombs,
on the battlefield, really impressed me.

Hmm, what? You want to be an
alchemist, too, huh?

No. My pursuit has always been the perfect swordsmanship.
But I think it's no harm to know more combat skills.

Even knowledge seemingly far-fetched from
swordsmanship, will come in handy one day!

Oh...
You are so intent on becoming more powerful, huh? Cresson.

Of course. My goal is to become the most powerful knight
of Bressisle! I'd do everything to realize this goal.
Then learn alchemy and reach perfection!

Er!... Uh? No, wait.
I just want to be a knight. I never said I want to learn alchemy...

Ha-ha, thank you, [px]!
Great~ I am more motivated!

Right, Cresson. If learning combat skills of alchemists could
help you, how about combat skills of witches and sages?

!!!
Er... that's right! That makes sense!!

Wait a minute, Cresson!?
Your eyes are lit up. That's so scary!

I... I am such a lucky person!
I have so many partners to learn from!

Guys, allow me to observe how you fight!
Look, there's a suitable monster to defeat over there!

Sigh~~ No, maybe next time!
[px]'s assignment is completed!

Hmm, I see...
But... but, I am not giving up!!!
